title: Understanding Watermarks
text: A watermark is a faint design or text that appears in the background of a document or worksheet. It is often used for branding or to indicate the document's status, such as 'Confidential' or 'Draft'.

title: Where to Find Watermark Options
text: In most spreadsheet applications, watermark options are found under the 'Insert' tab. This is where you can add various elements like images, shapes, and text to your worksheet.

title: Using WordArt for Watermarks
text: To add a watermark using WordArt, you need to select the 'Insert' tab, then choose 'WordArt' from the 'Text' group. This allows you to create stylized text that can be used as a watermark.
choices: click "display" and drag and drop a screenshot you would like to be the watermark
